title: [Self-Directed] Short-Intensive Course on Smart Technology Utilization for Designing Digital Educational Environments for Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool proficiency and mathematics education experience
context.additional_context: Learners participate to enhance their competency in designing digital educational environments within the mathematics curriculum. The training period includes practical exercises with smart assistant software.

learning_goals: Design a digital educational content production process utilizing smart technologies in online and blended learning environments
Explain strategies for applying digital tools to implement interactive mathematics educational activities in Zoom-based real-time classes
Utilize core functionalities of smart assistant software to design learner-customized digital educational environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
